values: If something is unfortunate, it is bad or unlucky.
It was unfortunate that Dave’s team lost, but he still had fun.
adj. 不幸的，倒霉的；时运不佳的；不成功的可叹的，令人遗憾的不合适的，粗野的，不得体的
n. 不幸的人副 词:unfortunately
